net.kencochrane.raven.marshaller

Interface Marshaller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonMarshaller

    public interface Marshaller
    Marshaller allows to serialise a Event and sends over a stream.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Marshaller.UncloseableOutputStream
      OutputStream delegating every call except for Marshaller.UncloseableOutputStream.close() to an other OutputStream.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void marshall(Event event, OutputStream destination)
      Serialises an event and sends it through an OutputStream.

    • Method Detail

      • marshall

        void marshall(Event event,
            OutputStream destination)
        Serialises an event and sends it through an OutputStream.

        The marshaller should not close the given stream, use Marshaller.UncloseableOutputStream to prevent automatic calls to OutputStream.close().

        Parameters:
        event - event to serialise.
        destination - destination stream.
